text: Heavy mortars are large-calibre mortars which fire a heavy shell on a high angle trajectory. These weapons have a short range, but are usually less complex than similar sized field artillery. This category includes the "Trench Mortars" of World War I. These were all heavy and difficult to move. ==Muzzle- loading== Caliber (mm) Weapon name Country of origin Design 50.8 2 inch Medium Mortar "Toffee Apple"Internal bore size not warhead size.
